parameters.name: configuredTableIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique ID for the configured table to retrieve.

nested_items.name: configuredTable
nested_items.description: The retrieved configured table.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the configured table.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for the configured table.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A name for the configured table.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description for the configured table.

nested_items.name: tableReference
nested_items.description: The table that this configured table represents.

nested_items.name: tableName
nested_items.description: The name of the Glue table.

nested_items.name: databaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database the Glue table belongs to.

nested_items.name: snowflake
nested_items.description: If present, a reference to the Snowflake table referred to by this table reference.

nested_items.name: secretArn
nested_items.description: The secret ARN of the Snowflake table reference.

nested_items.name: accountIdentifier
nested_items.description: The account identifier for the Snowflake table reference.

nested_items.name: databaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database the Snowflake table belongs to.

nested_items.name: tableName
nested_items.description: The name of the Snowflake table.

nested_items.name: schemaName
nested_items.description: The schema name of the Snowflake table reference.

nested_items.name: tableSchema
nested_items.description: The schema of the Snowflake table.

nested_items.name: v1
nested_items.description: The schema of a Snowflake table.

nested_items.name: columnName
nested_items.description: The column name.

nested_items.name: columnType
nested_items.description: The column's data type. Supported data types: ARRAY, BIGINT, BOOLEAN, CHAR, DATE, DECIMAL, DOUBLE, DOUBLE PRECISION, FLOAT, FLOAT4, INT, INTEGER, MAP, NUMERIC, NUMBER, REAL, SMALLINT, STRING, TIMESTAMP, TIMESTAMP_LTZ, TIMESTAMP_NTZ, DATETIME, TINYINT, VARCHAR, TEXT, CHARACTER.

nested_items.name: workGroup
nested_items.description: The workgroup of the Athena table reference.

nested_items.name: outputLocation
nested_items.description: The output location for the Athena table.

nested_items.name: databaseName
nested_items.description: The database name.

nested_items.name: tableName
nested_items.description: The table reference.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time the configured table was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The time the configured table was last updated.

nested_items.name: analysisRuleTypes
nested_items.description: The types of analysis rules associated with this configured table. Currently, only one analysis rule may be associated with a configured table.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: analysisMethod
nested_items.description: The analysis method for the configured table.

nested_items.name: allowedColumns
nested_items.description: The columns within the underlying Glue table that can be utilized within collaborations.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: selectedAnalysisMethods
nested_items.description: The selected analysis methods for the configured table.
(string) ---
